meanings.definition: The study of the biological basis of social behavior in animals and humans.
meanings.sent1: Sociobiologies help us understand why animals act socially.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in sociobiologies study how genes influence social behavior.
meanings.sent3: The class on sociobiologies made learning about animal friendships fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sociobiologies, genes are the architects of social structures.
meanings.sent5: The book on sociobiologies painted a vivid picture of social interactions.

meanings.definition: The theories and principles of sociobiology as applied to various species.
meanings.sent1: Understanding sociobiologies can shed light on animal behaviors.
meanings.sent2: The professor explained the importance of sociobiologies in studying species.
meanings.sent3: The debate on sociobiologies sparked interesting discussions in class.
meanings.sent4: Sociobiologies act as a lens through which we view animal societies.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on sociobiologies was both informative and engaging.

meanings.definition: The scientific discipline that examines the evolutionary origins of social behavior.
meanings.sent1: Sociobiologies explore how social behaviors have evolved over time.
meanings.sent2: The textbook delves into the history of sociobiologies.
meanings.sent3: The research in sociobiologies revealed fascinating insights into social evolution.
meanings.sent4: Evolutionary biologists often collaborate with experts in sociobiologies.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on sociobiologies showcased the development of social traits.
